$description: D&D 5e items (SRD 5.2). Weapons, armor, magic items, treasure, and gear.

data.name: Shield
data.description: AC +2. A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand.

data.name: Padded Armor
data.description: AC 11 + Dex modifier. Disadvantage on Stealth.

data.name: Leather Armor
data.description: AC 11 + Dex modifier.

data.name: Studded Leather Armor
data.description: AC 12 + Dex modifier.

data.name: Hide Armor
data.description: AC 12 + Dex modifier (max 2).

data.name: Chain Shirt
data.description: AC 13 + Dex modifier (max 2).

data.name: Scale Mail
data.description: AC 14 + Dex modifier (max 2). Disadvantage on Stealth.

data.name: Breastplate
data.description: AC 14 + Dex modifier (max 2).

data.name: Half Plate Armor
data.description: AC 15 + Dex modifier (max 2). Disadvantage on Stealth.

data.name: Ring Mail
data.description: AC 14. Disadvantage on Stealth.

data.name: Chain Mail
data.description: AC 16. Str 13 required. Disadvantage on Stealth.

data.name: Splint Armor
data.description: AC 17. Str 15 required. Disadvantage on Stealth.

data.name: Plate Armor
data.description: AC 18. Str 15 required. Disadvantage on Stealth.

data.name: Backpack
data.description: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

data.name: Lantern, Hooded
data.description: Casts bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

data.name: Oil (flask)
data.description: Oil usually comes in a clay flask that holds 1 pint. As an action, you can splash the oil in this flask onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw it up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact.

data.name: Rations (1 day)
data.description: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

data.name: Rope, Hempen (50 feet)
data.description: Rope, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

data.name: Tinderbox
data.description: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire.

data.name: Torch
data.description: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

data.name: Waterskin
data.description: A waterskin can hold 4 pints of liquid.

data.name: Arrows (20)
data.description: Arrows are used with a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack. The weight listed includes both the ammunition and the storage container (Quiver).

data.name: Bolts (20)
data.description: Crossbow bolts are used with a crossbow. The weight listed includes both the ammunition and the storage container (Case).

data.name: Bullets (Sling) (20)
data.description: Sling bullets are used with a sling. The weight listed includes both the ammunition and the storage container (Pouch).

data.name: Bullets (Firearm) (10)
data.description: Firearm bullets are used with a firearm. The weight listed includes both the ammunition and the storage container (Pouch).

data.name: Needles (50)
data.description: Blowgun needles are used with a blowgun. The weight listed includes both the ammunition and the storage container (Pouch).

data.name: Alchemist's Supplies
data.description: These supplies allow you to produce useful concoctions, such as potions and oils.

data.name: Thieves' Tools
data.description: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers.

data.name: Herbalism Kit
data.description: This kit contains a variety of instruments such as clippers, mortar and pestle, and pouches and vials used by herbalists to create remedies and potions.

data.name: Broken Bottle
data.description: Sharp glass.

data.name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
data.description: Your Strength score is 19 while you wear these gauntlets.

data.name: Ring of Protection
data.description: You have +1 to AC and Saving Throws.

data.name: +1 Shield
data.description: AC +3. A magic shield that provides additional protection.

data.name: +1 Plate Armor
data.description: AC 18 + 1 bonus. Magic plate armor. Str 15 required, Stealth disadvantage.

data.name: Potion of Healing
data.description: You regain 2d4 + 2 hit points when you drink this potion.

data.name: Potion of Greater Healing
data.description: You regain 4d4 + 4 hit points when you drink this potion.

data.name: Scroll of Identify
data.description: Cast Identify. The spell scroll disintegrates after use.

data.name: Wand of Magic Missiles
data.description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more charges to cast the magic missile spell from it.

data.name: Ornate Plate Armor
data.description: This beautifully crafted armor appears to be magical.
data.shown_effect: The armor appears to grant resistance to damage.
data.true_effect: While wearing this armor, you have vulnerability to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. The armor is cursed and cannot be removed until the curse is broken.

data.name: Bag of Holding
data.description: This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions.
data.shown_effect: The bag can hold up to 500 pounds of material.
data.true_effect: This bag is actually a creature's mouth. Living creatures placed inside are devoured. Items have a 50% chance of being lost when retrieved.

data.name: Ruby
data.description: A deep red, transparent precious stone.

data.name: Emerald
data.description: A brilliant green transparent gemstone.

data.name: Gold Elf Statue
data.description: A finely crafted statuette of an elf crafted from solid gold.

data.name: Ornate Iron Key
data.description: An ornate iron key with mysterious markings. Quest item.

data.name: Plain Silver Amulet
data.description: A plain silver amulet on a chain.
data.true_effect: While wearing this amulet, you are hidden from divination magic. You can't be targeted by such magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

data.name: Silvery Green Cloak
data.description: A silvery-green cloak with a hood.
data.true_effect: While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom (Perception) checks made to see you have disadvantage, and you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

data.name: Crystal Lenses
data.description: A pair of crystal lenses set in a simple frame.
data.true_effect: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. While wearing them, you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

data.name: Etched Leather Bracers
data.description: Leather bracers with etched runes.
data.shown_effect: Simple leather bracers with decorative etchings.
data.true_effect: While wearing these bracers, you have proficiency with the longbow and shortbow, and you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls on ranged attacks made with such weapons.

data.name: Leather Headband
data.description: A plain leather headband.
data.true_effect: Your Intelligence score is 19 while you wear this headband. It has no effect on you if your Intelligence is already 19 or higher.

data.name: Traveler's Clothes
data.description: Sturdy clothing suited for travel.

data.name: Fine Clothes
data.description: Fancy garments for formal occasions.

data.name: Costume
data.description: A costume for performances or disguises.

data.name: Robe
data.description: A simple robe.

data.name: Pouch
data.description: A cloth or leather pouch that can hold up to 20 sling bullets or 6 pounds of gear.

data.name: Book
data.description: A book containing text or blank pages for writing.

data.name: Parchment (1 sheet)
data.description: A single sheet of parchment for writing.

data.name: Holy Symbol (Amulet)
data.description: A holy symbol worn as an amulet. Used as a spellcasting focus for divine magic.

data.name: Holy Symbol (Emblem)
data.description: A holy symbol emblazoned on a shield or worn as decoration. Used as a spellcasting focus.

data.name: Holy Symbol (Reliquary)
data.description: A holy symbol contained in a tiny reliquary. Used as a spellcasting focus.

data.name: Mirror, Steel
data.description: A steel mirror useful for looking around corners.

data.name: Pot, Iron
data.description: An iron pot for cooking.

data.name: Shovel
data.description: A shovel for digging.

data.name: Crowbar
data.description: Grants advantage on Strength checks where leverage can be applied.

data.name: Manacles
data.description: Metal restraints that can bind a creature. Escaping requires DC 20 Dexterity check or DC 25 to break.

data.name: Tent
data.description: A simple two-person tent.

data.name: Rope, Hempen (50 feet)
data.description: Hempen rope has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

data.name: Lamp
data.description: Casts bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

data.name: Perfume (vial)
data.description: A small vial of perfume.

data.name: Spellbook
data.description: Essential for wizards. Has 100 pages for recording spells.

data.name: Quiver
data.description: A quiver can hold up to 20 arrows.

data.name: Arcane Focus (Crystal)
data.description: A crystal used as an arcane spellcasting focus.

data.name: Arcane Focus (Orb)
data.description: An orb used as an arcane spellcasting focus.

data.name: Arcane Focus (Rod)
data.description: A rod used as an arcane spellcasting focus.

data.name: Arcane Focus (Staff)
data.description: A staff used as an arcane spellcasting focus.

data.name: Arcane Focus (Wand)
data.description: A wand used as an arcane spellcasting focus.

data.name: Druidic Focus (Mistletoe)
data.description: A sprig of mistletoe used as a druidic spellcasting focus.

data.name: Druidic Focus (Wooden Staff)
data.description: A wooden staff used as a druidic spellcasting focus.

data.name: Druidic Focus (Yew Wand)
data.description: A yew wand used as a druidic spellcasting focus.

data.name: Brewer's Supplies
data.description: Artisan's tools for brewing beverages.

data.name: Calligrapher's Supplies
data.description: Artisan's tools for calligraphy and fine writing.

data.name: Carpenter's Tools
data.description: Artisan's tools for carpentry and woodworking.

data.name: Cartographer's Tools
data.description: Artisan's tools for mapmaking.

data.name: Cobbler's Tools
data.description: Artisan's tools for shoemaking and leather work.

data.name: Cook's Utensils
data.description: Artisan's tools for cooking.

data.name: Glassblower's Tools
data.description: Artisan's tools for glassblowing.

data.name: Jeweler's Tools
data.description: Artisan's tools for jewelry making.

data.name: Leatherworker's Tools
data.description: Artisan's tools for working with leather.

data.name: Mason's Tools
data.description: Artisan's tools for stonework and masonry.

data.name: Painter's Supplies
data.description: Artisan's tools for painting.

data.name: Potter's Tools
data.description: Artisan's tools for pottery.

data.name: Smith's Tools
data.description: Artisan's tools for metalwork and smithing.

data.name: Tinker's Tools
data.description: Artisan's tools for repairing and tinkering with objects.

data.name: Weaver's Tools
data.description: Artisan's tools for weaving cloth.

data.name: Woodcarver's Tools
data.description: Artisan's tools for carving wood.

data.name: Disguise Kit
data.description: A kit for creating disguises. Includes makeup, hair dye, and small props.

data.name: Forgery Kit
data.description: A kit for creating forged documents.

data.name: Navigator's Tools
data.description: Tools for navigation including a compass, calipers, and charts.

data.name: Poisoner's Kit
data.description: A kit for creating and applying poisons.

data.name: Gaming Set (Dice)
data.description: A set of dice for gaming.

data.name: Gaming Set (Dragonchess)
data.description: A Dragonchess set for the popular strategy game.

data.name: Gaming Set (Playing Cards)
data.description: A deck of playing cards.

data.name: Gaming Set (Three-Dragon Ante)
data.description: A deck for the Three-Dragon Ante card game.

data.name: Musical Instrument (Bagpipes)
data.description: A set of bagpipes.

data.name: Musical Instrument (Drum)
data.description: A drum for making music.

data.name: Musical Instrument (Dulcimer)
data.description: A dulcimer for making music.

data.name: Musical Instrument (Flute)
data.description: A flute for making music.

data.name: Musical Instrument (Horn)
data.description: A horn for making music.

data.name: Musical Instrument (Lute)
data.description: A lute for making music.

data.name: Musical Instrument (Lyre)
data.description: A lyre for making music.

data.name: Musical Instrument (Pan Flute)
data.description: A pan flute for making music.

data.name: Musical Instrument (Shawm)
data.description: A shawm, an early form of oboe.

data.name: Musical Instrument (Viol)
data.description: A viol, similar to a violin.

data.name: Burglar's Pack
data.description: Includes a backpack, 1,000 ball bearings, 10 feet of string, a bell, 5 candles, a crowbar, a hammer, 10 pitons, a hooded lantern, 2 flasks of oil, 5 days rations, a tinderbox, and a waterskin.

data.name: Diplomat's Pack
data.description: Includes a chest, 2 cases for maps and scrolls, a set of fine clothes, a bottle of ink, an ink pen, a lamp, 2 flasks of oil, 5 sheets of paper, a vial of perfume, sealing wax, and soap.

data.name: Dungeoneer's Pack
data.description: Includes a backpack, a crowbar, a hammer, 10 pitons, 10 torches, a tinderbox, 10 days of rations, and a waterskin.

data.name: Entertainer's Pack
data.description: Includes a backpack, a bedroll, 2 costumes, 5 candles, 5 days of rations, a waterskin, and a disguise kit.

data.name: Explorer's Pack
data.description: Includes a backpack, a bedroll, a mess kit, a tinderbox, 10 torches, 10 days of rations, and a waterskin.

data.name: Priest's Pack
data.description: Includes a backpack, a blanket, 10 candles, a tinderbox, an alms box, 2 blocks of incense, a censer, vestments, 2 days of rations, and a waterskin.

data.name: Scholar's Pack
data.description: Includes a backpack, a book of lore, a bottle of ink, an ink pen, 10 sheets of parchment, a little bag of sand, and a small knife.

data.name: Healer's Kit
data.description: This kit has 10 uses. You can use an action to expend one use to stabilize a creature with 0 hit points.

data.name: Component Pouch
data.description: A small, watertight leather belt pouch containing material components for casting spells.
